content.question: Which of the following accurately explains an implication of the data in the map?

choices.label: People in southern Nigerian states have access to better health care and higher-quality education than do people in northern Nigerian because there is more wealth in the South.
Southern Nigerian states have more representatives in the Senate because that is where the greatest concentration of people live and where the greatest concentration of wealth is.
There is a higher quality of life in northern Nigerian states than in southern Nigerian states because oil reserves in the North provide high-paying jobs.
The media is more transparent and accessible in northern Nigerian states because of the greater concentration of wealth in this region.

content.answer: People in southern Nigerian states have access to better health care and higher-quality education than do people in northern Nigerian because there is more wealth in the South.
